mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.nickname AS board_nickname, bi.bi_name AS board_name FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN tbl_board_info bi ON b.board_info = bi.bi_id LEFT JOIN tbl_users u ON b.board_writer = u.username WHERE b.board_info = #{boardVO.board_info} AND b.board_p_no = 0 AND b.board_delete = 0 AND #{boardVO.search_type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardVO.search_txt}, '%') ORDER BY b.board_no DESC LIMIT #{pageVO.limit} OFFSET #{pageVO.offset}
SELECT b.*, u.nickname AS board_nickname FROM tbl_board b, tbl_users u WHERE b.board_p_no = #{board_no} AND b.board_delete = 0 AND b.board_writer = u.username ORDER BY b.board_no ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_board WHERE board_info = #{board_info} AND board_delete = 0 AND #{search_type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_txt}, '%')
SELECT b.*, u.nickname AS board_nickname FROM tbl_board b, tbl_users u WHERE board_no = #{board_no} AND b.board_writer = u.username
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board ( board_p_no, board_info, board_writer, board_date, board_time, board_subject, board_content, board_filename, board_category ) VALUES ( #{board_p_no}, #{board_info}, #{board_writer}, #{board_date}, #{board_time}, #{board_subject}, #{board_content}, #{board_filename}, #{board_category} )
